Detailed Description

Class to wrap up the complexity of the different possible input files to SummaryGenotypeEngine.

Definition at line 47 of file SummaryGenotypeEngine.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SgIoHelper::SgIoHelper ( const std::string &  summariesFile,
const std::string &  summariesFileA,
const std::string &  summariesFileB,
const std::string &  file5,
const std::string &  file5Group 
)

Constructor.

Take a number of files and figure out which one(s) has been set to read from.

Parameters:
summariesFile Text summary file with results interleved.
summariesFileA Text summary file for A alleles
summariesFileB Text summary file for B alleles
file5 File5 version of the summary file above
file5Group Which group the summary file5 is in with name "summaries"
